title: Download OO Containerized charts package (EKS)
content:
Download the zip file and copy it to the bastion node you created during the SMA installation.

The Helm chart versions are indicated using the x.x notation. Replace it with the version relevant to your deployment. For example, if your deployment needs version 25.2.0 Helm chart package, replace oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip with oo-helm-charts-1.7.0+25.2.0.zip. 

Follow these steps:

  1. Download the .zip file from the Software Licenses and Downloads website.
  2. Create a directory on the bastion node. 
    For example: 
    ssh -i <path_to_bastion_ssh_key> user@<bastion_ip>
mkdir -p /home/centos/oo_chart
  3. Copy the .zip file downloaded in Step 1 in the path created in Step 2.
    For example: 
    scp -i <path_to_bastion_ssh_key> <path_to>/oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip user@<bastion_ip>:/home/centos/oo_chart/oo-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip
  4. Unzip the archive.
    For example: 
    ssh -i <path_to_bastion_ssh_key> user@<bastion_ip>
unzip /home/centos/oo_chart/oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip -d /home/centos/oo_chart/

The following table describes the essential files inside the OO Containerized chart package:

Name

File

OO Helm chart file

oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/oo-1.x.x+26.x.x.tgz

Example persistent volume and persistent volume claims yaml files

Persistent volume templates:
oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/samples/persistent_storage/eks/volumes.yaml

Persistent volume claims templates:
oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/samples/persistent_storage/eks/claims.yaml

Persistent volume Readme file:
oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/samples/persistent_storage/eks/README
